timeline.message:
fix exam cover
comment out exam session
student exam can be fetched when visible

Merge branch 'feature/exam-mode/online-mode-first-iteration' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into feature/exam-mode/online-mode-first-iteration

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/webapp/i18n/de/exam.json
#	src/main/webapp/i18n/en/exam.json

fix compiler error
simplyfy if statement

only load one student participation at once in studentExams/conduction REST call

also update the test case to check that the response is valid

remove exam-session.service.ts
remove more unnecessary fields in exam-participation-cover.component.ts
add implementation of OnChanges for modeling-exam-submission.component.ts
convert ISO Date strings to moment objects after retrieving exam from server

download StudentExam only when Exam is Started
add server call for retrieving exam only
exchange StudentExam for exam where it makes sense
remove unnecessary subscriptions in exam-participation.component.ts
loading of StudentExam moved to exam-participation-cover.component.ts -> load immediatly after startExam button click

temporarily exchange the load exam with an existing endpoint for tutors and instructors
put exam into local storage immediately after it was downloaded
Add get exam route for conduction
use new endpoint for retrieving exam
fix submit button for programming exercises

replace refactored call with hasCourse()
This check was in place to find out wether the exercise is supposed to be a exam exercise or course exercise

fix getStudentExamForConduction

remove transactional and unnecessary code
I tested that this works in the test case and on the server this time ;-)
delete studentExams when Exercise or ExerciseGroup is deleted
Do not show the "open code editor" button in exam programming exercise participation

Improve error message when not able to load exam.
This should also cover the issue when an exam is visible but the student exams have not been generated
rerender submission component on exercise change
change OnChanges for OnInit, because views are now re-renders on exercise change
Commit programming exercise on switch to other exercise or automatic save

Programming Exercises can only be in ExerciseMode.INDIVIDUAL for exam exercises
- fix missing translation
Fetch feedback for programming exercises. Also set the result directly into the participation as the client expects it there for displaying of result feedback.

remove transactional (which is not needed) and wrong code
adjust style of the navigation buttons
Remove unnecessary fetching of feedback. The result details component already does this.
